local_intent: Align to the T-block, set yaw 90, make contact, then perform two push strokes at 135 degrees (0.1 m each); ensure the block remains visible.
assumptions: Named targets t_block and t_block_contact are defined and reachable
coherence_with_global: Matches the global detect-align-yaw-contact sequence and executes two controlled pushes with the same parameters; concludes with a visibility check before subsequent placement steps.
